title: Type System - TypeScript
description: Convert type system implementations from JavaScript to TypeScript. This includes Matrix types, number type utilities, and type conversion functions.

tasks.description: Convert Matrix type utilities: matAlgo*.js, matrixAlgorithmSuite.js files to TypeScript
Convert number type utilities: number.js and related number type files to TypeScript
Convert Chain type implementation to TypeScript with proper generic typing
Convert remaining type utilities: ResultSet, Help, etc. to TypeScript

acceptanceCriteria: All 45 type system files converted to TypeScript
Matrix algorithm suite properly typed with generics
Type utilities provide strong type inference
Chain type supports method chaining with proper types
